Posts.Content: Mamabear, if a cyst comes back, it may need to be removed.please, find a good breast surgeon, and don't pay attention to those technicians-i know exactly how it feels when they suddenly don;t look you in the eye ir say something like''I am just taking pictures here''
Posts.Title: recurrent cyst a problem?

Posts.Content: Ginger Tea, Surgeon never mentioned radiation. She referred to my lump as " entity" that needs to be removed. What confuses me is that the radiology reports recommended excisional biopsy , but surgeon said I need lumpectomy. When I pointed that out, this is where she was evasive. Hugs to your sister.
Posts.Title: benign biopsy and lumpectomy???

Posts.Content: So after my discordant biopsy that showed only benign fibrocystic changes, surgeon sceduled me for a lumpectomy!!! I have never been more scared or confused, and she seemed to dodge all my questions about why I need a lumpectomy . So my question is to the people on this board- what is your lumpectomy experience was and why you need it also, is lumpectomy same as excisional biopsy. I read different things on the internet , and frankly it all doesnt make sense to me. Any feedback is appreciated
Posts.Title: benign biopsy and lumpectomy???

Posts.Content: My surgeon wanted me to do MRI even with a normal mammo becuase i too have very dense breast tissue in my right breast. i declined the MRI 3 months ago , but had to come back in august because of other problem. this time i did the MRI. it is not that bad, especially if you take valium before it.but I know how you feel.
Posts.Title: Worried. Being called back for 2nd mammogram...
